Text: HowdyPST Hi Sandra I hope you had a nice Christmas and a fun holiday season We as you can imagine with three year old boys it was hectic but the look on their faces Christmas morning was priceless I wanted to let you know that I am leaving Prebon as of January th I have spent the last eight years of my years in the Energy field with Prebon and we part on the best of terms I am talking with a few banks a consulting firm and some energy companies but also plan on spending some time at the house with the family I will let you know when and where I decide to go Hopefully we can work together again in the future Best wishes for continued success in and the years to come Please give my best to Kenny Sincerely Bill H C F mailto mailto underscore between young and
